thread.title: Homeless men's tears of joy after Gary Neville offers building to stay in - Crewe Guardian
thread.title_full: Homeless men's tears of joy after Gary Neville offers building to stay in - Crewe Guardian - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Crewe Guardian
title: Homeless men's tears of joy after Gary Neville offers building to stay in - Crewe Guardian
text:
Millionaire Manchester United legend Gary Neville made a group of homeless men cry after giving them somewhere to stay this winter. The millionaire footballer is allowing around 30 mainly young men squat in Manchester's former stock exchange building, which he is developing into a boutique hotel.
 Crewe Guardian.
